name: The Last Robot
description:
They are not friendly.... but they are a lot.

Defend your planet tiny robot! or what is left from it.

Non-stop waves of aliens will try to destroy you. Surprisingly, their long-distance laser weapons where disabled after entering atmosphere.

MOVE with A, and D.  JUMP with spacebar, and buy UPGRADES with 'U'.

Of course, you shoot your with mouse.

*Be sure to be in a safe place at entering the upgrade menu... some of the aliens will not wait for you to become stronger... or will use their secret tecniques to make you fall.
